title: Groom
overview: William, the son of a wealthy hotel owner, celebrates his 30th birthday in one of his father's hotels. During his party, William accidentally injures the hotel's bellboy. In his father's opinion, this time William has gone too far. He decides to stop supporting William financially and to disinherit him if he doesn't take the place of the bellboy he hurt. William, who has never worked a day in his life, will have to start from scratch in his father's hotel.
